title: Wrong Answer Penalty
description: Take a sip for each wrong answer in the round.

title: Multiple Sips
description: Take two sips for each wrong answer.

title: Everyone Wrong
description: If everyone gets it wrong, everyone takes a shot.

title: All Correct
description: If everyone gets it right, everyone takes a sip.

title: Right Answer Only
description: Only those who got it right take a sip.

title: Right Streak
description: If you get two right answers in a row, take a shot.

title: Someone's Wrong
description: If someone gets it wrong, everyone else assigns them a sip.

title: Assign Sips
description: If you get it wrong, you assign sips to others.

title: High-Five Last
description: Everyone high-fives, and the last person to do so takes a sip.

title: Fastest Wrong
description: The person who answered wrong the fastest takes a sip.

title: Speed Penalty
description: The slowest to answer takes a sip.

title: Host's Choice
description: The host chooses who takes a sip.

title: Fast Right
description: The fastest correct answer makes everyone else take a sip.

title: Double Penalty
description: Double the sips for the next wrong answer.

title: Wrong Streak
description: If you get three wrong answers in a row, take a shot.

title: Category Challenge
description: If a category is announced, everyone answering wrong in that category takes a sip.

title: Speed to Shot
description: The slowest to answer takes a shot.

title: Wrong Assign
description: Guess who got it wrong; if wrong, take a sip.

title: Host Rule
description: The host creates a new rule for the round.

title: Explanation Punishment
description: If you get it wrong, explain the correct answer and take a sip.
